modName: zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods with hairs - Chinese Translation
summary: This is the Chinese Version of zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods with hairs V3.0 . Unzip it and use the .esp file to cover the original one.
descriptionHtml:
zzjay and Grace Darklings Hoods with hairs V3.0 - Chinese Translation
Installation
-download the file
-unzip it
-use the .esp file to cover the original one
Here is the original mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28147
Please endorse the original author if you appreciate this mod.
author: zzjay
